page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES, COVENTRY.
page.content: In each game one person is "on". He must catch someone else to take his place. {OFF GROUND TIG.}You are only safe if you are off ground. We use the logs by the playground. {SCARECROW TIG.}You must keep running about until you are caught. Then you stand with your arms out. You can be freed by someone running under your arms. When you have been caught 3 times you are "on". {LINE TIG.}We use the lines of the netball court. One person is a traffic signal and calls out changes of direction. You cannot go off the lines or disobey the signals. {SEMI CIRCLE TIG.}The safe areas are the semi circles on the playground. You must get from one to the other without being caught.
